argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dvabase.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | dvabase.e | |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | dvabase.u | |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) |
| 4 |  | dvabase.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) |
| 5 |  | dvabase.c | |- C = ( Base ` F ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) = ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) |
| 7 | 1, 6, 3, 4 | #P_dvasca | |- ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) -> F = ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) -> ( Base ` F ) = ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) -> C = ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) = ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 10, 2, 6, 11 | #P_erngbase | |- ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) -> ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) = E ) |
| 13 | 9, 12 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) -> C = E ) |
